item.title: Paper accepted at IEEE Transactions on Evolutionary Computation!
item.description: I am happy to announce that our paper “Statistical Models for the Analysis of Optimization Algorithms with Benchmark Functions” by David Issa Mattos, Jan Bosch and Helena Holmstr√∂m Olsson has been accepted for publication at the IEEE Transactions on Evolutionary Computation (DOI:10.
